properties.description: Open from Monday 7th November. On a Monday you could have a go at a craft, on Tuesday try painting or drawing. Wednesday mornings is for companionship . Wednesday evening is an opportunity to play table tennis or other games. Thursday mornings activities for parents & young children.n We have a range of games available-cards and board. We would offer more if requested . Diffferent sessions offer different alternative activities.
